title: New behind the scenes volunteer opportunities
content:
[caption id="attachment_1053" align="alignright" width="225"] Volunteer Karen helping to audit our ethnography collection.[/caption]

Have you ever wondered what happens behind the scenes in the museum stores? We’re currently undertaking a major audit of our collections in store and are looking for volunteers to help.

This is an exciting opportunity to get up close with the collections and discover more about how we care for and document objects in store.

We’re looking for enthusiastic volunteers who can make a regular commitment. In return we will provide full training and a friendly volunteering environment.

Can you or someone you know help us? Please email Becky Harvey, Assistant Museum Officer at museum@nuneatonandbedworth.gov.uk to find out more and request a role description.
source: Behind the Scenes at Nuneaton Museum
